title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Tough Love
writer: Ben Chambers (story), Matt Fleckenstein (screenplay), Tyler Perry (based on the characters created by), Barbara Wall (story)
actors: Tyler Perry, Cassi Davis, Rolonda Watts, Avery Kidd Waddell
plot: After a hilarious run-in with the law, Madea is sentenced to community service. Determined to do good for the 'hood, Madea enlists Aunt Bam and Uncle Joe to try and save the Moms Mabley Youth Center from being shut down. With her irresistible sass and wisdom, Madea rallies the local kids to make a stand-and proves that behind her tough exterior is a whole lot of love!
